title: Playing Fair
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Prejudices
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-respect
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Peer pressure
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Race discrimination
description: A series of four dramas for 7-12 year olds intended to promote discussion on the issues of racism, respect and equality for children. Each episode revolves around a conflict where a child is taunted and discriminated against because they are a member of a minority group. The situations are credible and expose the impact of such behaviour on children.
